snippet: Strategies are shifting for musical artists (including Madonna) and their labels when album tracks are hacked and released.
abstract: Digital music distribution methods that make it easier for people to download musicians' material illegally also allows artists to take control of leaks of their work and make profit on them; latest examples are leaks of songs by Madonna and Bjork, which resulted in both musicians releasing their work earlier than planned.
lead_paragraph: Strategies are shifting for musical artists (including Madonna) and their labels when album tracks are hacked and released.

headline.seo: Björk and Madonna Deal With Leaks of Album Tracks
headline.main: When Digital Thieves Strike, Artists Act Quickly to Seize Opportunity
headline.print_headline: When Digital Thieves Strike, Artists Act Quickly to Seize Opportunity
